attr.title: Mega Man X8 16-bit
attr.desc: The Mega Man X8 16-Bit Demake is a fan-made project that reimagines the original Mega Man X8 in the style of the classic 16-bit era. This demake brings the modern aesthetics and mechanics of the original game into a retro environment reminiscent of the SNES era, particularly the earlier Mega Man X titles on that system.
attr.inst: https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/mega-man-x8-16-bit-demo3.1504/ grab the zip from here, extract it and rename the File to
after that put it in megamanx816-bit/gamedata folder
